name: Avoid using SecTransform API
description: The SecTransform API must not be used for Security are deprecated and must not be used within an iOS application.

rationale:
Mobile apps that communicate over the Internet often fail to properly implement SSL/TLS, if they implement it at all. These failures could leave users’ communications open to interception and even session hijacking. Using SSL/TLS properly involves careful checking of the server’s certificate chain. 
Thus, an app or library that validates SSL/TLS certificates should do the following checks to ensure strong.

qualityStandards.name: Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm Usage
Use strong cryptography and security protocols
The application must protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information.
